Madoff's game

Our exciting new game : try to win the jackpot. If you don't you start earning dividends from new players.
In this game you always win something, the only question is how much ?


Current jackpot : 1.23456 TRX

TYzahqrVWMZ9KhQgF18fTLocZQD7z4Srnc - will win in :


MY WALLET :

My current earnings : 3026.568794 TRX

We are a new TRON gambling dapp

In this game the last player to had buy a share when the countdown end win the jackpot.
Each time a player buy a share the coundown get reset and the jackpot get inscrease by 40% of the share price.
The rest of the share price is split among previous shareholders.

14 Steps

This is a 14 steps game: each time the jackpot reach a certain amount game goes into next step.

On each new step the countdown max time decrease and price per share is increased.

Here you have a board listing the steps:




Earn new players money

Each time a new share is perchase 50% of the share price get split equaly among all previous players.

Understand that here is no guaranted return: your earnings depend on how much players will play after you.

You can withdraw your winning at anytime.

We have realized an imperfect projection on how much you could win from where you buy share.




Win the jackpot

If coundown reach 0: the last person that had buy a share win 80% of the jackpot.

The rest: 20%, is split equaly among all unlucky shareholders.

If jackpot reach 180 millions EOS the game stop and the contract execute a random fonction to draw a winner.
In this precise case: each share you own give you one chance to win.


How To Play

In order to play you need a TRON wallet with some TRX on it + TRONLINK plugin installed.
Follow the step bellow if you need help.

Create a TRON wallet



Login with Tronlink


Choose the number of shares you want to buy, 1 minimum.


Click buy then confirm your purchase with the TronLink popup.
